Package org.apache.juneau.jsonschema

Class JsonSchemaGeneratorSession

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.ContextSession
org.apache.juneau.BeanSession
org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseSession
org.apache.juneau.jsonschema.JsonSchemaGeneratorSession
public class JsonSchemaGeneratorSession
extends BeanTraverseSession
Session object that lives for the duration of a single use of JsonSchemaSerializer.
  • This class is not thread safe and is typically discarded after one use.
  • JSON-Schema Support

  • Nested Class Summary

    • getSchema

      public JsonMap getSchema​(java.lang.Object o) throws BeanRecursionException, SerializeException
      Returns the JSON-schema for the specified object.
      Parameters:
      o - The object.
      Can either be a POJO or a Class/Type.
      Returns:
      The schema for the type.
      Throws:
      BeanRecursionException - Bean recursion occurred.
      SerializeException - Error occurred.

    • getSchema

      Returns:

    • getBeanDefs

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​JsonMap> getBeanDefs()
      Returns the definitions that were gathered during this session.

      This map is modifiable and affects the map in the session.

      Returns:
      The definitions that were gathered during this session, or null if JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder.useBeanDefs() was not enabled.

    • addBeanDef

      public JsonSchemaGeneratorSession addBeanDef​(java.lang.String id, JsonMap def)
      Adds a schema definition to this session.
      Parameters:
      id - The definition ID.
      def - The definition schema.
      Returns:
      This object.

    • getAddDescriptionsTo

      protected final java.util.Set<TypeCategory> getAddDescriptionsTo()
      Add descriptions to types.
      Returns:
      Set of categories of types that descriptions should be automatically added to generated schemas.

      Allow nested descriptions.
      Returns:

      protected final java.util.List<java.util.regex.Pattern> getIgnoreTypes()

    • isUseBeanDefs

      protected final boolean isUseBeanDefs()
      Use bean definitions.
      Returns:
      true if schemas on beans will be serialized with '$ref' tags.
      See Also:
      JsonSchemaGenerator.Builder.useBeanDefs()
